> -----Original Message-----
> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbr@...]
>
> Scott:
>
> Have you identified how a test-driven class implements a FSM? If I give
> you some code that I test-drove, would you try identifying how it is a
> FSM? That would be very interesting.

I'd be willing to try.  I would be interested to have an example that's not
my own or borrowed out of a book.  But I'm working with a few book examples
right now, trying to sort things out and see how far I can take this FSM
idea.

Scott S.
